result.title: Nintendo Today!
result.description:
Nintendo Today! is an app that brings you daily updates from Nintendo based on what you like.

◆ Animated Calendar
Keep track of the date with an animated calendar! Choose from themes featuring Super Mario, The Legend of Zelda, Animal Crossing, and more.

◆ Daily Updates
Get updates on Nintendo Switch 2 news plus game info, videos, comics, and more every day.

◆ Event Schedule
Check the schedule to learn about Nintendo Direct presentations, game releases, in-game events, and more.

◆ Customise Your Home Screen
Add a calendar widget featuring art from your favourite Nintendo game series.

[Terms of Use]
Nintendo Account and persistent internet connection required. Data charges may apply.
Requires Android 9.0 or later.

Please note: this app's content currently uses U.S. English but may be updated to feature British English in the future.

© Nintendo
